22 /* SerialPortHandler */
23 SerialPortHandler::SerialPortHandler(HardwareSerial& port, const int dir_pin)
24  : DXLPortHandler(), port_(port), dir_pin_(dir_pin), baud_(57600)
25 {}

27 void SerialPortHandler::begin()
28 {
29  begin(baud_);
30 }
31 
32 void SerialPortHandler::begin(unsigned long baud)
33 {
34 #if defined(ARDUINO_OpenCM904)
35  if(port_ == Serial1 && getOpenState() == false){
36  Serial1.setDxlMode(true);
37  }
38 #elif defined(ARDUINO_OpenCR)
39  if(port_ == Serial3 && getOpenState() == false){
40  pinMode(BDPIN_DXL_PWR_EN, OUTPUT);
41  digitalWrite(BDPIN_DXL_PWR_EN, HIGH);
42  }
43  delay(300); // Wait for the DYNAMIXEL to power up normally.
44 #endif
45 
46  baud_ = baud;
47  port_.begin(baud_);
48 
49  if(dir_pin_ != -1){
50  pinMode(dir_pin_, OUTPUT);
51  digitalWrite(dir_pin_, LOW);
52  while(digitalRead(dir_pin_) != LOW);
53  }
54 
55  setOpenState(true);
56 }
57 
58 void SerialPortHandler::end(void)
59 {
60 #if defined(ARDUINO_OpenCR)
61  if(port_ == Serial3 && getOpenState() == true){
62  digitalWrite(BDPIN_DXL_PWR_EN, LOW);
63  }
64 #endif
65  port_.end();
66  setOpenState(false);
67 }
68 
69 int SerialPortHandler::available(void)
70 {
71  return port_.available();
72 }
73 
74 int SerialPortHandler::read()
75 {
76  return port_.read();
77 }
78 
79 size_t SerialPortHandler::write(uint8_t c)
80 {
81  size_t ret = 0;
82  if(dir_pin_ != -1){
83  digitalWrite(dir_pin_, HIGH);
84  while(digitalRead(dir_pin_) != HIGH);
85  }
86 
87  ret = port_.write(c);
88 
89  if(dir_pin_ != -1){
90  port_.flush();
91  digitalWrite(dir_pin_, LOW);
92  while(digitalRead(dir_pin_) != LOW);
93  }
94 
95  return ret;
96 }
97 
98 size_t SerialPortHandler::write(uint8_t *buf, size_t len)
99 {
100  size_t ret;
101  if(dir_pin_ != -1){
102  digitalWrite(dir_pin_, HIGH);
103  while(digitalRead(dir_pin_) != HIGH);
104  }
105 
106  ret = port_.write(buf, len);
107 
108  if(dir_pin_ != -1){
109  port_.flush();
110  digitalWrite(dir_pin_, LOW);
111  while(digitalRead(dir_pin_) != LOW);
112  }
113 
114  return ret;
115 }
116

118 {
119  return baud_;
120 }
